admin.cleanupInfoText:
‚Ä¢ Audit logs are automatically cleaned up based on retention policies
‚Ä¢ Logs older than {{days}} days are deleted
‚Ä¢ Only the most recent {{maxLogs}} logs are kept per profile
‚Ä¢ Cleanup operations are logged for audit purposes
‚Ä¢ This process is irreversible - deleted logs cannot be recovered
